content.slogan: Three days of true Estonian heat

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Where does the festival take place?
faq.a1: Barbar Feast 2021 takes place in the exciting Viking Village surrounded by the beautiful nature of Saula village in Kose parish.
faq.a2: The Viking Village offers all kinds of experiential accommodation in different houses, saunas, cabins, aswell as tents (either your own or their historically authentic and Viking tents).
faq.q3: Are we allowed in with our own drinks?
faq.q5: Can I pay for stuff with debit?
faq.a5: Probably, but we advise you to have some cash on you in case of power outages and other unexpected bugs.
faq.a6: As long as it's not against the rules of the Viking Village, probably.

footer.msg: Barbar Feast is brought to you by rock club Barbar!
